Sarfarosh

Rank: 780


After his brother is killed and father severely injured by terrorists- a young med student quits his studies to join the Indian Police Service to wipe out the terrorists.


Director: John Mathew Matthan

Writer: Hriday Lani, John Mathew Matthan, Pathik Vats

Stars: Aamir Khan, Naseeruddin Shah, Sonali Bendre

Tags: Conspiracy Thriller, Cop Drama, Action, Crime, Drama, Thriller
